name: KasikornBank
overview: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited provides consumer, commercial, and corporate banking services in Thailand and internationally. It offers lending, deposit-taking, credit card, international trade financing, custodian, lease financing, asset and funds management, investment banking, factoring, finance leases, operating leases, and hire purchase services. The companyâ€™s deposit products include savings deposits, e-savings, fixed deposits, and current deposits. It also receives, manages, develops, and sells properties that have been foreclosed. The company has operations in Hong Kong, Los Angeles, Cayman Islands, Shenzhen, Beijing, Shanghai, and Kunming. As of October 17, 2006, it operated 568 branches and 3,130 ATMs in Thailand. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
